subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Kyle Orton was selected to be the Chicago Bears’ starting quarterback by Coach Lovie Smith, winning a competition with Rex Grossman for the job. Orton will start Thursday’s preseason game against the San Francisco 49ers and the Sept. 7 opener against the Indianapolis Colts.
